subject: Promising plane crash debris ITC audio
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Just to update and share some information I provide the following...  
As many of you know, I have asked 8 ITC researchers to assist me with 
an ITC session involving plane crash debris.  I sent those 8 
researchers an envelope containing the debris and asked them to use it 
in five, 30 second sessions and send me the audio files.  I gave them 
no detailed information, except that it was a commercial plane crash to 
keep the sessions more controlled.
Today I received the first of the audio files from one of those 
researchers.  After listening to his third file, my jaw dropped after 
hearing what I did.
This is very promising, and I hope to get additional relivant files 
from the other researchers.
I'll be sharing all the details in the video I'll be putting on my 
Youtube page early next year.

Thanks to all of you who are participating!
- Mike C. (UFO Geek)
http://www.ufogeek.com
